name: Net Jacobsson
overview:
Net Jacobsson a former Facebook executive, serial entrepreneur and currently the founder & CEO of PlayHopper, a company focusing on social game mechanics for the consumer Web.  Net is an active advisor to several start-ups, Crowdstar, AuroraFeint, King.com and is a board member of the exclusive Chinese social network P1, targeting the growing luxury market in China.
Previously Net was leading International Business Development & Mobile Business Development at Facebook and held leading positions in companies like: Maxthon, Mashup Media, ICQ and Sony Ericsson.
